name: Better Safe
description: Expand The Safe with a calendar.

sunday-first.name: Sunday First
sunday-first.description: Whether to start the week on Sunday instead of Monday.

show-checkmarks.name: Show Checkmarks
show-checkmarks.description: Whether to show checkmarks on completed levels.

show-days.name: Show Days
show-days.description: Whether to show the day of the month on each level.

show-particles.name: Show Particles
show-particles.description: Whether to show particles on uncompleted levels.
